meanings.definition: A person or thing that implants.
meanings.sent1: The skilled implanters at the hospital helped many patients.
meanings.sent2: The implanters carefully placed the seeds in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The little robot implanters were on a mission to plant flowers all over the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as implanters, embedding themselves in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The tiny implanters buzzed around, spreading magic wherever they went.

meanings.sent1: The doctor used the implanters to insert the chip into the patient's arm.
meanings.sent2: The implanters were essential tools in the surgeon's kit.
meanings.sent3: The futuristic implanters looked like something out of a sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent4: The implanters gleamed under the bright lights of the operating room.
meanings.sent5: With a gentle click, the implanters seamlessly integrated the new technology into his body.
